vsParam:
Varerian, sorry to keep you waiting!
We've brought you the ingredients!

Perfect timing!
Alright! I'll make all of them at one go!

Um—! So delicious—!
Varerian's cuisines are the best!

It feels so good to have a hearty meal... after working so hard.
My tired body gets nourished...

Hee hee, thank you.
My hard work pays off.

Students in the Academy enjoy my cuisines very much.
I think I can do this.

Hey, we told you that your cuisines are delicious, right?
You should be more confident.

Yeah, that's right. Your encouragement assured me.
So, I've decided! I'm going to be a chef!

I will become an outstanding chef,
and attract more people with my cuisines.

Yeah! That's great!
I'll support you!

Yeah, thanks to you guys!
Hee hee, thank you!

Yeah! I couldn't have found my dream without you guys.
Hee hee, thank you!

Ha ha ha, your dream!
Of course we'd support your dream!

That's right! Look over there... But, if you become famous,
we wouldn't have the chance to eat your cuisines...
So, maybe it's better if we don't support you?
Hey, don't say something like that!

Ha ha, I'm just kidding.
Go get it, Varerian.
